snippet: Sush Krishnamoorthy, a student in New Delhi who is applying to universities in the United States, wants to assure her prospective colleges that she is "a worthy investment who will give them manifold returns."
abstract: Sush Krishnamoorthy, a student in New Delhi who is applying to universities in the United States, wants to assure her prospective colleges that she is "a worthy investment who will give them manifold returns."

headline.main: What I Wish My Financial Aid Applications Revealed
